From: 
< 
To: Kimberly Mehlman-Orozco 
Cc: ' " < 
>, ' 
Subject: RE: Expert Witness 
Date: Thu, 29 Oct 2020 18:52:17 +0000 
(USANYS)" 
Thanks very much for the additional information. I don't think it makes sense to speak this afternoon, but thanks for 
offering. We'll review and circle back if it would be useful to discuss further. Thanks again for your time. 
From: Kimberly Mehlman-Orozco 
Sent: Thursday, October 29, 2020 10:52 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
I  <  
(USANYS) 
Subject: Re: Expert Witness 
No worries, M. I'm actually very surprised. If you still wanted to chat and share what exactly you're looking 
for, I'd be happy to recommend someone who might be a better fit. 
With that being said, I just testified earlier this week in a Daubert Hearing for Federal Prosecutor 
  . I'm sure that you might find the hearing transcript of interest at a minimum, and it 
sheds light in the content of my testimony. Similarly, the trial transcript for this case, where I  testified for the 
prosecution: https://www.eastbaytimes.com/2017/06/10/infamous-danville-sex-trafficking-case-comes-to-trial-
defendant-spyder-featured-on-americas-most-wanted/ 
Best, 
Kim 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Oct 
29, 2020, at 10:26 AM, > wrote: 
Thanks very much for sending these materials. After reviewing them, unfortunately I think we are seeking an expert with 
different areas of expertise, so I think it makes sense to cancel our call. Thanks very much for your timeâ€”
From: Kimberly Mehlman-Orozco 
Sent: Wednesday, October 28, 2020 8:48 PM 
To: 
Cc 
I  < 
Subject: Re: Expert Witness 
Sure, that works. CV and fee schedule attached. 
I look forward to chatting tomorrow. 
>; 
(USANYS) 
EFTA00020878

Best, 
Kim 
On Wed, 
Oct 28, 2020 at 6:48 PM wrote: 
Thanks very much -- 3:30 p.m. tomorrow would be great, if that works for you, and if ou're able to send 
those materials that would be helpful. We can use the following conference line: 
passcode 
Thanks, 
From: Kimberly 
Mehlman-Orozco < 
Sent: Wednesday, October 28, 2020 6:23 PM 
To: 
Kimberly 
Mehlman-Orozco 
Cc: 
(USANYS) 
Subject: Re: Expert Witness 
Also, I  have some availability tomorrow before noon or after 3:00pm, if that works better. 
Please let me know what works for you and if you'd like a CV and fee schedule in the interim. 
Best, 
Kim 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Oct 28, 2020, at 1:17 PM, Kimberly Mehlman-Orozco < wrote: 
Hi=, 
Yes, I have some time to chat this week. I  have availability today or Friday before noon or after 3:00pm. 
I can be reached on my cell 
Best, 
Kim 
Sent from my iPhone 
On 
Oct 28, 2020, at 1:10 PM, 
Dr. 
Mehlman-Orozco, 
or feel free to circulate a call-in number.

My 
colleagues, 
and and I are the prosecutors in the case of United 
States v.  Ghislaine Maxwell, which is scheduled to go to trial on July 12, 2020 in the Southern District of

New York. We would be interested in speaking with you about your availability to testify at trial. Are 
you available for a call this week to 
discuss? 
Thanks very much, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
Dr. Kimberly Mehlman-Orozco
